author: Thomas Mäder
comment: Used it for hikes in Mallorca and La Palma. Couple of small usability issues, but quite servicable. Seems to still want to download maps even for saved routes.

author: Jaime Paiva
comment: Perfect for outdoor activities. Easy to plan trails and save offline on your phone. Navigation features still have room for improvement

author: Danka Majerechova
comment: Plan & Do & Save & Publish Outdooractivities incl. Offline maps. Synchronization and planning on PC possible. The best apk for alpine countries. Hoping other world parts & countries will be added later.

author: Brian Hunt
comment: Seems to be a comprehensive app, still learning to use it.

author: Graham Ruxton
comment: Easy to use and great offline mode to save mobile data charges and when signals disappear.

a bit disappointed by the offline maps. why is there a limit of 40x40km?  I understand that this is enough for a walk, but I would like to download the map of my region at once instead of downloading every time small parts

author: Bertram Wagenblatt
comment: Relativ unbrauchbare App, das Geld für die Premium-App hätte ich mir sparen können. Support ist auch eher als mäßig zu bezeichnen. :-( :-( :-(  Relatively unusable app, the money for the premium app I could have saved me. Support is also rather than moderate

author: Erik Adler-Michaelson
comment: Für Leute die jegliche outdoor Aktivitäten lieben, ist die App ein muss
title: Super App

author: Mohammadsadegh Sadri
comment: I installed the premium version of this app. It has still a long way to go to become a reliable app. The map view crashed on my galaxy s6 when i was exploring. Furthermore, in the map view the big circles with number of routes cover the undelaying city names comlletely. You can not see where you are in the map.
title: Still needs a lot of improvements

author: ricardo monteblan
comment: Excellent app and used in conjunction with their website it allows you to plan, track and learn new trails. Really good, solid and professional. Cheap actually for the functionality.
title: Everything and more

author: David Gruys
comment: Also ich bin nicht zufrieren mit der App. Wieso? Die Applikation ruckelt und ist langsam. Insbesondere die Kartenansicht ist unbrauchbar. Wenn ich könnte würde ich sie wieder eintauschen! :(
title: Kartenansicht mit Bugs
